mapper.update: update date_standard set agemin = #{agemin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agemax = #{agemax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, heightmin = #{heightmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, heightmax = #{heightmax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marrige = #{marrige,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, agemin, agemax, heightmin, heightmax, salary, education, address, marrige from date_standard
